title: Chio-chan no Tsuugakuro (Chio's School Road)
synopsis: For the average Japanese high school student, walking to school can be a chore, but for first-year Chio Miyamo, it's always an adventure. Constantly running late due to her long night sessions playing video games, she is forced to come up with new routes to make it to Samejima Private Academy on time.
characters: ['Miyamo, Chio', 'Nonomura, Manana', 'Andou, Mayuta', 'Kushitori, Madoka', 'Gotou', 'Andou, Chiharu', 'Hosokawa, Yuki', 'Setoyama', 'Shinozuka, Momo', 'Miyamo, Mother']
